bibdata.title: Guide for the Detection of Acoustic Emissions From Partial Discharges in Oil-Immersed Power Transformers
Guide for the Detection of Acoustic Emissions From Partial Discharges in Oil-Immersed Power Transformers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide is applicable to the detection and location of acoustic emissions from partial discharges and other sources in oil immersed power transformers and reactors. It is intended to provide a means of associating the relative magnitude and position of partial discharges and other sources with the acoustic signals obtained by strategically located transducers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.127-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.127-2000)
